definition: Inner Mongolia autonomous region, abbr. 內蒙古|内蒙古[Nei4 meng3 gu3], capital Hohhot 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4]
pinyin: Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在內蒙古自治區，喜歡摔跤。

sentences.english: Chestnut soil is one of the main types of soil in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 慄鈣土是內蒙古自治區最重要的一種土壤類型。

sentences.english: This research is one of programs of Natural Science Fundation Committee of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 本研究是內蒙古自治區自然科學基金課題。

sentences.english: Hotels have won the three-star hotel in Inner Mongolia best title.
sentences.chinese: 賓館曾三次榮獲內蒙古自治區最佳星級飯店稱號。

sentences.english: People's Government of Ewenke, administrative division of the county level, in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古自治區鄂溫克族自治旗人民政府。

sentences.english: Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region is briefly named as Inner Mongolia with Hohhot as its capital city.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古自治區簡稱內蒙古，省會城市是呼和浩特。

sentences.english: Inner-Mongolia is located in the peripheral area of the Monsoon climate region.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古自治區地處季風氣候邊緣區。

sentences.english: Huhhot is the capital of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 呼和浩特是內蒙古自治區的首府。

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: Mianyang prefecture level city in north Sichuan, Sichuan's second city
abbr. for 聯合國大會|联合国大会[Lian2 he2 guo2 Da4 hui4], United Nations General Assembly/abbr. for 國立西南聯合大學|国立西南联合大学[Guo2 li4 Xi1 nan2 Lian2 he2 Da4 xue2], National Southwest Combined University
Tibetan autonomous region, Tibetan: Bod rang skyong ljongs, abbr. 藏[Zang4], capital Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4]
Aketedu county in Xinjiang (on the border with Kyrgyzstan)
Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region, abbr. 新, capital Urumqi or Ürümqi 烏魯木齊|乌鲁木齐
